name: Gulf Resources, Inc.
description: Gulf Resources, Inc. is a leading company engaged in the production and distribution of chemical products primarily for the oil and gas industry. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Shouguang City, Shandong Province, China, Gulf Resources specializes in bromine, crude salt, and other chemical products. The company operates through its subsidiaries, which are involved in the extraction of bromine and the manufacturing of derivatives like flame retardants and other specialty chemicals. Gulf Resources is committed to innovation and sustainability, focusing on environmentally friendly practices in its operations. The company plays a vital role in the global chemical market, supplying high-quality products and demonstrating a strong commitment to meeting the needs of its customers. With a strategic vision and a dedicated workforce, Gulf Resources aims to expand its market presence and enhance its product offerings while maintaining its reputation for quality and reliability.
